en: Enable AutoBattler
Enable Camera Smoothing
Camera Smoothing Speed
Item Weight
Projectile Weight
Tree Weight
Boss Weight
Wall bumper Weight
Egg Weight
Wall Bumper Distance
Enable AI Visualization
Show AI Marker
Enable the AutoBattler.  When activated a bot will take control of the game during the wave attempting to keep an optimals distance from enemies and projectiles.
Enable Visualizations for the AI.  When active, elements that the bot cares about will be highlighted with bigger highlights for objects the bot cares about more.
Show a marker next to the player when the AI is Active.  This is intended for streaming and video recording when you want to highlight the fact that a human is not in control of the game.
Enable Camera smoothing.  Many find the AI's sudden movements painful to follow.  Smoothing prevents the camera from being hard snapped to the player's position.
The rate at which the smoothing camera will follow the player.
Controls how strongly the bot will be attracted to gold pickups.
Controls how strongly the bot will be repelled by enemy projectiles.
Controls how strongly the bot will be attracted to trees.
Controls how strongly the bot will be attracted to bosses.
Controls how strongly the bot will be repelled by walls.
Controls how strongly the bot will be attracted to unhatched eggs.
Controls the minimum distance to a wall the bot will try to maintain.
